subject: Need help with my order
body: Hi, I placed an order last week but haven't received any confirmation. Can you help me track it down?

subject: Product pricing inquiry
body: I'm interested in your premium subscription plan. What are the current rates and what features are included?

subject: Complaint about delivery service
body: I'm very disappointed with your delivery service. My package was supposed to arrive yesterday but it's still not here. This is unacceptable.

subject: Feedback on new feature
body: I just tried the new dashboard feature and it's amazing! Much more intuitive than before. Great work on the improvements.

subject: General question about services
body: I was wondering if you offer international shipping and what the typical delivery times are to Europe?

subject: Technical support needed
body: I'm getting an error message when trying to log into my account. It says 'Invalid credentials' but I'm sure my password is correct.

subject: Bulk order quote request
body: We're looking to place a large order for our company. Can you provide a quote for 100 units with volume pricing?

subject: Poor customer service experience
body: I called your support line yesterday and was on hold for 45 minutes. When someone finally answered, they were rude and unhelpful.

subject: Suggestion for improvement
body: I think it would be really helpful if you could add a dark mode option to your mobile app. Many users prefer it for night-time use.

subject: Business hours inquiry
body: What are your customer service hours? I need to speak with someone about my account but I'm only available in the evenings.

subject: Account access issues
body: I can't seem to reset my password. The reset link in the email isn't working and I'm locked out of my account.

subject: Enterprise pricing information
body: We're evaluating your platform for our enterprise team. Can you send me information about enterprise licensing and custom features?

subject: Damaged product received
body: The item I ordered arrived damaged. The packaging was torn and the product inside is broken. I need a replacement immediately.

subject: Appreciation for great service
body: I wanted to thank your team for the excellent service last week. Sarah from support went above and beyond to help me resolve my issue.

subject: Return policy question
body: I'm not satisfied with my recent purchase. What's your return policy and how do I go about returning an item?
